topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5557f7b56368727fde740b00#post_5557f7b56368727fde740b00
I honestly ship Peach and Bowser

First because Mario has no actual personality 
And second because I honestly imagine that if Peach gave him the chance, he would be  the sweetest  guy ever

Honestly his problem is trying too hard to get her attention

"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5557fa146368726c7ef90000#post_5557fa146368726c7ef90000
It's my MOM's currently broken plate.
It's HER KITCHEN. So basically, HER STUFF.

It's like going to a friend's house and you accidentally broke something. You feel guilty as fuck.
